description.en-US:
Guid provides clear, step-by-step assembly instructions, setup guides, and troubleshooting help for products from IKEA, Wayfair, Home Depot, Amazon, Target, and more.

— FEATURES —

• ASSEMBLY GUIDES: Swipe through illustrated step-by-step instructions with pinch-to-zoom on every diagram
• AI TROUBLESHOOTING: Get instant help from our AI assistant — describe your problem or snap a photo
• BARCODE SCANNER: Scan product barcodes to instantly find the right guide
• OCR LABEL READER: Photograph product labels to extract article numbers automatically
• OFFLINE GUIDES: Download guides for use without internet (Premium)
• MULTI-RETAILER: Compare prices across retailers and find the best deals
• DARK MODE: Full dark mode support for comfortable reading in any lighting

— PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION —

Upgrade to Guid Premium for:
• Unlimited AI chat sessions
• Offline guide downloads
• Priority AI processing
• Ad-free experience
• Photo diagnosis

Pricing: $9.99/month or $99.99/year

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your App Store account settings after purchase.

Terms of Service: https://guid.how/terms
Privacy Policy: https://guid.how/privacy
